attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to call for the British Government to remove its embassy from Tehran. Following the attack on the British Embassy in Iran on this day 29th November 2011 and a strong anti-British sentiment within Iran itself (including its politics, chants of "death to Britain" were heard this week in their Parliament.) Compounding the need for this is Iranian defiance, in the face of there seemingly undeniable aim of procuring Nuclear Weapons.
